name: Armistice Bastion Pass
description:
This pass provides permanent access to the Armistice Bastion, a neutral ground in the never-ending Mist War.
• Quick Travel to All Cities
• Access to WvW Maps and Team Chat
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild-Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
• And more! All within easy reach, for those who enjoy the ultimate convenience.
